website_summaries.verdict: This set of 6 mesh bags allows you to sort your laundry as you travel and makes your dirty clothes easy to pack.
pros: Clothes can wash in the bag
Seams are bound for a quality finish
Travel bag in mesh allows you to see what you have in the bag while still keeping your dirty separate from your clean
cons: The mesh does not offer any way to help contain smells inside your bag

customer_reviews.title: Mesh Bags won't Attack your Sequins!
customer_reviews.text: I used the smaller bags for my bras (I closed the bra snaps first so it would not snag the mesh). I used the other bags to wash my sequin tops (pic attached). I used one of them for my beaded top (pic attached). None of the sequins fell off. None of the beads fell off. I did turn the tops inside out prior to putting them in the mesh bags to avoid the beads and sequins snagging the mesh. I am very pleased with how the mesh bags held up in the washing machine (I did use the delicates cycle). The largest bag is HUGE and it worked well for my sequined squirrels on skis sweatshirt (don't judge me).
customer_reviews.author: T. Webster

customer_reviews.title: construction quality
customer_reviews.text: There was a construction issue with the bags I received. See picture as I found them out of the package. The mesh was stretched during construction making the zippers pucker. With the zippers always pushed out instead of laying flat it could compromise durability. I plan to use them as laundry bags not travel so optimal durability is a concern. The mesh is large as stated for good water flow.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! I just used it for the first time in my washer today and it ripped! Totally useless! I am not happy with this product .
customer_reviews.author: aurore

customer_reviews.title: Zi[ppers weak, break after one use
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but they became very limp after once use. One of the zippers now opens when it shouldn't. Disappointed it's not a little better quality. I don't expect these to last very long. Update: 10/15/17 -- Well, they didn't last long. The zipper opened on EVERY bag, usually after one wash. And mesh on large bag gave out. Very disappointing. Can't recommend these for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Penina

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply and poorly made. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are not well made. They do NOT stay closed. In fact, the biggest one's zipper was faulty right out of the packaging. I would not recommend these if you are actually trying to keep your clothes in the Bay. I would not have bought these if I could have seen them in person.
customer_reviews.author: K. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: For how cheap these were, I was expecting a low quality product... but these are great! They come packaged very nicely, and they hold up great in the washer! I really like the different sizes and how many there are, now I can wash a shirt and a few bras without them all having to be in the same bag!
customer_reviews.author: ali a.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't survive the maiden voyage
customer_reviews.text: Tore on the first ride in the washer dryer. It contained a scarf and a sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Little

customer_reviews.title: Detergent still left on my bras. Sad.
customer_reviews.text: It wash well. Did not come unziped. Very sturdy and easy storage. HOWEVER, when I pulled out my bra out of the "mesh bag" it had detergent still. It also had a bit of lint on. I honestly don't like these for bras. (See the photo). Anyone else having these problems. I use liquid detergent and liquid fab. Softener. Photo attached are photos of my wet black bra coming out the Landry with other black clothes. Did not dry. I have never had this problem before washing my bras alone in the past without the mesh bag. I guess the detergent got into the net/mesh and didn't get out well. Will be sadly returning. This stink:(
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay closed
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about .year now. I buy reusable cotton rounds and wash them instead of disposable cotton pads so I used these bags to collect/wash them. They will. not. stay. closed. I have had to pull cotton them out of my lint trap, the drain in my washing machine. These bags cause me to lose and have to replace the rounds all together. I would not recommend these bags if you are using them for small items. I am going to try safety pinning them first before completely giving up... but I shouldn't have to and it kind of defeats the points if I was better off buying a simple bag from an Etsy user.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I needed the small bags, which are hard to find. I used one small bag twice and the zipper broke. Returned the set.
customer_reviews.author: SZzzz

customer_reviews.title: No more hand washing! Thick, tight mesh
customer_reviews.text: Love my mesh laundry bags! Use them almost every day I do laundry, especially for all my hand wash items (too little time to do these in the sink!!), and they work great. Nice and fine weave on bags keep out lint and pet hairs, and look like they'll last a long time. Just replaced my old open mesh bags of 10+ years ago with these. Good size assortment-using all but the largest one often. Lost a star because it takes time to wedge the zipper pull under the protective elastic-I prefer the old bags that have a seam designed to cover the pull tab automatically when zipped closed.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyOne

customer_reviews.title: Not completely terrible, but definitely not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 8 months ago. The white bags have all gotten dingy and gray, and two of the zipper pulls have come off. They're still functional after I reattached the zipper pulls with new rings. I wouldn't buy this particular set of bags again.
customer_reviews.author: A.J. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Zipper opened during wash...
customer_reviews.text: Pointless bag, tried to wash my sons Michael Kors track suit in the large bag and the zipper came open during wash cycle and the track suit was mixed in with the rest of the load. Hopefully, this will not cause the oufit to be damaged by not following the wash instructions for a $300.00 outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Queen

customer_reviews.title: The zippers are defective and open entirely in wash.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric quality is very nice, durable, smooth and will not catch on anything. The zippers are durable but defective. The appearance is nice, fresh looking. But there is a significant drawback. I have used the three smallest sizes. Every single time I pull them out of the washer, the zipper has opened and the piece of clothing is outside of the mesh bag! That doesn’t make any sense at all! I will try them a couple of more times, but if they do that all the time I will return them as defective by design and useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jane S.

customer_reviews.title: I need more!
customer_reviews.text: I use these CONSTANTLY for laundry! The various sizes work well for all different kinds of garments. These also work well in the dishwasher if you need to wash small things you don’t want falling through. They’ve held up amazingly well. I haven’t had any rips in the mesh or broken zippers and I use these quite a bit on a weekly basis.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Rigual

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly strong & soft mesh
customer_reviews.text: These bags surprised me, the mesh is really strong in that it has a lot of tensile strength yet so soft I have no problems putting even my thinnest pantyhose in. Also there are so many bags of at least gallon ziplock size or bigger it is really useful. I can put lingerie in one bag, and workout clothes in another. They come out of the wash good as new, I make sure to follow the instructions of no bleach etc. Very pleased with the value and performance. If you found this review helpful please click below, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: engk916

customer_reviews.title: So far...  exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These bags are fabulous for the washer/dryer. The size selection also allows for a lot of versatility. I've only had these bags for a few weeks, but I've washed sweaters in the larger one, lingerie in the smaller and medium size ones, and they work well both for allowing the items to be thoroughly washed and dried. Some bags are made well, but the holes are spaced so close together that the item never gets wet enough and/or takes way too long to dry. These a allow the water and air through and work exactly as I was hoping they would. They seem to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: mlp

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know how I lived without these?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I went 38 years before using one of these. They are amazing for delicates. Great for jackets and hoodies as well. Edit: refer to the photos I posted to see how to secure the zippers. Otherwise they open up during washing and dryer. Took me a couple of loads to figure that out....lol
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, worth their money
customer_reviews.text: I've already used these multiple times to was the masks I have sewn with other clothes, for my sports bras, and for regular ones. They are MUCH sturdier than the ones you can find in Walmart for cheaper. These bags are not regular mesh, as in, they don't have giant holes your bra hooks will hook into after all or get tangled in. These are definitely worth their money. The zippers have different colors for easy identification. I have not yet used the giant black bag, but I will once I wash my fancy shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: One Month Review
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've used every bag in this set every week for the last month and its become a staple in my home. I've washed items that range from bras, pajamas, and silk pillow covers. These mesh bags protect my more delicate items and I firmly believe will extend the life of them. So glad I found these! I saw some reviews that show melted bags but have had only positive experiences with mine. It could be because I only use them in the cold wash setting and tumble dry low setting. I also appreciate the zipper covers, which protect my other garments from getting nicked from the metal. Would highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: I like that these have the safety spot for the zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that these have the safety spot for the zipper to tuck into. They work quite well as far as keeping things in shape and unshredded, but if you have anything that needs a little bit of scrubbing these bags don't really allow what is inside of it to move around enough unless maybe you just put 1 pair of socks or 1 underwear or 1 shirt in it. I only put 2-4 small items in the small bags to try to give it space to move around in the wash. I have also washed some stuffed animals in the bigger bags and it definitely helped keep them a little fluffier and less clumpy when they dried.
customer_reviews.author: A.Ng

customer_reviews.title: Great for delicates!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for my washing delicates, clothing with strings, and some delicate lace clothing. The bags seemed crunchy and stiff at first but after using them once or twice, they softened up. The zippers are sturdy and the different sizes are great. I like the bags a lot and they seem very durable. I have one large one stored away in my gym bag so I can put my sweaty gym clothing in it and allow some air flow into the bag to help everything stay bacteria free. Overall, worth the price! I like the different colored zippers which key me organized when looking for bags with specific types of item (sports bras, headbands, underwear, etc,).
customer_reviews.author: wesley j. moder

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace some old ones that were worn out after years of use. The mesh fabric is sturdy, zippers and elastic seem well sewn. Really liked the largest black bag which I am using as a "dirty laundry" bag for traveling. The other bags are great for traveling or for washing delicates in the laundry. We use them to launder our masks during the pandemic so the elastic doesn't get destroyed, as well as for washing delicates like bras and undergarments. Good value, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Albertson Family

customer_reviews.title: Keep Underwear Safe
customer_reviews.text: I like how there is a little pocket you can push the zipper back into so that it doesn't open in the wash, however, one time it did open and my bra came out and the underwire got a bit bent out of shape. I've used them quite a few times, and this only happened once, though. Also, my washing machine is quite aggressive. I am glad I purchased them, however, they by and large do an excellent job at protecting my delicate clothes.
customer_reviews.author: R. N. Kinnison

customer_reviews.title: These bags are great at protecting delicates and allowing them to get clean at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wash the 5 cloth face masks I now use when leaving the apartment. Wearing a face mask when entering a business or getting on public transportation is now mandatory where I live. I felt confident that these mesh laundry bags would protect my cloth face masks as they sloshed around in a public commercial washing machine. I washed the masks in cold water with the machine set on the delicate cycle. I decided to put one mask each inside one bag, except for the largest of the 4 bags I used, into which I placed 2 masks. The different colored zippers on these bags add a sense of fun, something we all need.
customer_reviews.author: Mirri

customer_reviews.title: Not eligible for return
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these is not impressive, and I’m frustrated that although I purchased this Amazon Prime item less than 30 days ago, it is not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: I love these bags.
customer_reviews.text: These laundry bags are wonderful. I used to put my bras through the washer and dryer and they would stretch out and lose elasticity. I would even poke a hole through it with the underwire. I just got these bags and they are so easy to use. I fold my bras in half and can fit 2 in each one. You zip it up and throw them in the wash with the rest of your laundry. I also put them in the dryer. My bras came out exactly as I put them in. The bags held up well in the washer and dryer and I didn't have any issues with it. I can't recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Katz

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Very irritated! I only used the large bag once on gentle cycle with a small dress in it. The bag was ripped after the wash cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa earl

customer_reviews.title: High-quality laundry bags
customer_reviews.text: After the last of our old mesh laundry bags fell apart, I settled on these as a replacement. And I was incredibly impressed with their quality. These are nice bags with a fine weave that keeps delicate bits like buttons or sequins from getting snagged, and strong zippers with an extra flap for tucking away said zipper and avoiding further catching. And the multiple sizes are great as well -- small ones get used for bras, larger ones for sweaters and other items that need some protection in the washing machine. And as an extra bonus, the largest bag can be used for storage, whether for the bags themselves or as a clothes bag. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Starflight

customer_reviews.title: Great mesh bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. The material is thick and durable, but permeable enough to let water and detergent through to wash the clothing inside. I use these for socks and bras in the washer, so they don’t get eaten or destroyed by the washer agitator. For traveling, I use them for the same thing; dirty socks and underwear go in there so I can just toss it in the washer when I get home. I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: charrell0823

customer_reviews.title: Clothes don't wash well and takes forever to dry
customer_reviews.text: Worst laundry washing bag I've ever had. Water doesn't run threw it easily and my clothes take forever to dry on it. Because they are so dense, water doesn't go threw it easily and it doesn't clean my clothes in the bag well at all. And the rest of my delicates will be almost dry and the ones in the bag are still soaking wet! I'm going to try and find the thick fish net ones I already have that let my clothes get clean and not just eventually get them wet and take forever to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: I've stopped feeding the sock-eating dryer gnomes!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been an advocate for mesh laundry bags but these meet more needs than most. The medium and small bags are great for putting delicates such as underpants, camisoles or tights in the wash and then to line dry. Nothing really special there. The big black bag, however, is big enough to hold all the socks in a load of laundry (we have a 2 person household) with room to spare to agitate and get clean. The bag-o-socks goes in the dryer, and all the socks come out of the dryer together! No more missing socks! Makes pairing socks faster and I have stopped feeding the sock-eating dryer gnomes!
customer_reviews.author: kdn

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money and durable
customer_reviews.text: The set I bought from Bed and Bath broke so needed a few more to keep my clothes and other items intact from the washing machine. These are the right size for most of my items and these are a good value for how many bags you get. I no longer fear my office wear, spaghetti strap dresses, etc. will be torn. Zippers work smoothly and glide easily from one side to another. I've been able to wash some of my backpacks in our top loader without fear the agitator will rip them apart. Nothing bad to say, just overall a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Save time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Wash your bras, hosiery, lingerie, silk blouses, sweaters, etc in the washing machine! Works even better if you have a TOP loading washing machine. No icky dry cleaning chemicals. Don’t have to run to the dry cleaners. Environmentally friendlier and healthier. And save lots of time. These are large and small enough. There are six of them. I purchased two packages. So far, they are lasting and functioning well. No holes in the bag fabric. Fabric is not catching on hosiery. The zippers are holding up and not getting stuck. I use these with most laundry loads.
customer_reviews.author: HA Lundeen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!! It has saved me so much time.
customer_reviews.text: I love these laundry bags! I was so tired of untangling my laundry every time I had to put it in the dryer. I can’t believe I went this long without these bags. They have saved me a ton of time and the potential of having a complete melt down. I’ve gotten so bougie with these bags that now I even put my socks in a bag so I don’t lose any of them or have to sort them. My bras also get a much better clean when I place it in the bag.. I don’t know how but they always smell better than normal. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works well, bought more for family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2017 (it's now 2020), and it's still going strong. I liked it so much I bought others for family. I use it for items that I machine wash but don't want to put in the dryer. I also use it for delicates that have lace on it when washing bras, because the hooks on the bras don't catch on the material of the bags. I highly recommend and would buy again without question, if I needed more!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry bags with all the features you need
customer_reviews.text: These laundry bags are great. The zippers have plastic handles or pulls so they will not damage items like metal ones can. They are also held in place under an elastic pocket so they are not even able to contact wash items. These are fine mesh, preferable for delicate items that might be damaged in a large open mesh bag. The sizes are large enough to be of real use as opposed to the tiny one item bags I have gotten before. As the person responsible for laundry duty these will keep me out of the dog house by insuring safe laundering of household delicates.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The value of these bags is fantastic. For me, they are just fine. This is my second order (my husband saw how efficient I was laundering and drying my socks, undies, etc. using the first set of bags I purchased several months ago, and now HE wants to do the same!) The quality is good enough for me to use. I'm going to guess they'll last for a few years, which is fine with me. I'm more prone to losing the bags as opposed to wearing them out, even though I wash my things weekly at least. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonobsession

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed. They keep some of my more delicate clothes from tangling or pilling, and I just generally like to use them for socks to avoid losing socks mysteriously in the dyer. I also like to use them for leggings, because it makes it easy to identify them when switching loads so I can easily find items I want to air-dry. Would definitely recommend, I feel like my clothes are lasting so much longer by using these for proper washing care!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret W.

customer_reviews.title: An item that is hard to live without now
customer_reviews.text: For years I would put our families clothes in the washer together and I would have to remember to not put bras, certain dresses, or my cycling gear into the dryer. Having these bags are great since it not only helps protect delicate items but easily allows us to sort certain items to air dry. We have found these bags are particularity good for drying face coverings, but you could also use them for travel use once that starts back up. We have used these bags for probably 4-6 washes and they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jrasero

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality...Ripped in one wash.
customer_reviews.text: Very brittle material...I liked The idea of them but I used one to wash a small accent pillow (and there was plenty of room around the pillow) but the net ripped in the washer or dryer idk???
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Best Mesh Bags I’ve Had
customer_reviews.text: Best mesh laundry bags I’ve ever owned. I’ve had many over the years, including some from the store you only shop at with a coupon. All either tore, zippers broke or opened during the wash cycle. These are well made, and have a great elastic piece that keeps the zipper closed, thus protecting your clothing during the entire wash cycle. The package I got had enough to share some with my daughter in college. I would not hesitate to buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Heather K.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like these! I’ve used them several times and have had no issues with them. However, sometimes I’ll open them after having thrown them in with my other clothes and there is what I think is lint all over my bras. It’s weird that it’s able to get inside the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: good, sturdy, does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Our order contained 3 large and 3 medium of these mesh laundry zippered bags. I immediately used a large one to put a small blanket knitted by my daughter in to it for the gentle cycle in my washer and then dryer and the item came out intact. The zipper remained closed. I had to stop the wash cycle because after a few seconds I realized I hadn't tucked the zipper in to the band that covers it and thought it might help it stay closed (and not clang around in the dryer). I'll continue to use them and report back if there is anything else to be learned.
customer_reviews.author: B. Altman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for anyone who does laundry in a public place. No more disappearing socks, no more pillowcases on the questionable laundry room floor. The only issue I had with these bags is that the zipper pull will sometimes catch under the elastic band. No matter what I did, it was stuck under the band due to the angle you have to pull under the band. Only way to fix this is to clip the band. Just a small design flaw. I've had this happen with 4 of the 6 bags, I've used these regularly for several months. It doesn't render them useless but they sometimes unzip in the dryer now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Zippers open during every wash and clothing falls out
customer_reviews.text: Zippers unzip every time I use them, so my delicate items fall out and get tangled up in the wash. Of course the return window closed so now I’m stuck with this waste of money. Wish I had just purchased more of the bags I already had, but I went with these bc of all the positive reviews and that was a huge mistake.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I ordered this and received them in @ 4 days after ordering... I've used one same one (pink zipper small squared bag) for 3 times on the washer and 2 times in the dryer and it has hold really well! Looks the same as day 1. The 2 circular ones are the best because they seem ticker but they all are great overall! For the price I think you should just get this ones... You won't regret it I'm positive. HIGHLY RECOMMEND! :)
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: These bags come in variety of sizes. The truth is, I can't imagine I will EVER need the largest, but you never know. The smaller bags are just right for various items. Two bras in a medium bag is perfect. The items come out clean, bras are unbent and unstretched. I can even throw the bag in the dryer if I want. Can't beat the price. Update: Husband has just informed me that the large bag is excellent for mopheads.
customer_reviews.author: Aikobabe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough but come undone
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set of six mesh laundry bags that zip and tuck because mine were old and falling apart. The medium bags are plenty large, providing room for delicates. The large bags are large enough for a sweatshirt. I primarily use the large bags for my sports bras and thin clothing. The downside to these bags is that the zipper can sometimes come untucked and let a few items out. I tuck the zipper in the pocket every time, so this can be annoying when I'm looking for my PEDS socks. Apart from this, they are worth the purchase if you need an upgrade like I did!
customer_reviews.author: Whittybitty247

customer_reviews.title: Great for washing cloth masks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically to wash the many cloth masks we currently use, these bags are stiffer than the other laundry bags I use for lingerie, but those would sometimes twist a bit in the wash and put extra strain on the nose wires. These are better for getting the masks clean without them getting twisted in the laundry, the bags provide more protection and sturdiness and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags for my babies socks and smaller items that I didn’t want to get lost in the midst of washing and drying .. I put them in the bag and zipped it, once the washer stopped I opened it and the bag, half of the socks were out of the bag and all over the place .. definitely defeated the purpose of me putting them in there. Disappointed in the purchase wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyofblue

customer_reviews.title: These laundry bags protect your delicates from getting tangled in your washing machines,
customer_reviews.text: I put my bras and face masks in these laundry bags when I wash them. Then they don’t get tangled with other items in that particular load. The zippers continue to open and close smoothly. They serve the purpose for which I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with these bags. I have purchased laundry bags in the past that have fallen apart after only a few washes but I can tell already these are going to last. Very well constructed and sturdy. Allows laundry to vent without any snaps or hooks getting caught in the bag itself. Love the variety of the sizes and the color coding. I use one for each member of my family for their socks and underwear and it really makes laundry so much easier for me. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: cb520

customer_reviews.title: Bittersweet
customer_reviews.text: The bag does what it's supposed to do, hold your delicates so they don't get snagged or snag other clothes in the wash. However, the fabric of the bag itself is made of a rather 'rough' fabric, almost like when you starch clothes - how rough and rigid it makes the fabric feel. I have other garment bags from another company and the material is much softer. I would assume because these bags are cheaper, they are made with cheaper fabric..?
customer_reviews.author: Mama2018

customer_reviews.title: They seem sturdy; time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: Nice! The XL is BIG! Seems like a sturdy set, but will have to use them a lot more to make that determination. Very pretty, sizes make them versatile, zippers SEEM sturdy. VERY fine weave, which I like; if you somehow need a more open weave, look elsewhere, but I like the fact that no bra hooks can poke in or out of these and risk catching on something delicate. (Ever had that happen?) :D
customer_reviews.author: old_MK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for washing "delicates"
customer_reviews.text: I needed some laundry bags to keep certain garments protected from the other items in the washer load. These are absolutely perfect for that, and I love the variety in sizes and the color-coding of the zipper panel things. If I were to suddenly lose all of them, I would definitely purchase again. I've used each several times now, and have no issues with tears/holes in them. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Krisxan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. They're sized perfectly at two different sizes. The fabric is soft. The zipper handle is sort of rubbery or made of silicone. Tucks nicely underneath a flap to help it last a little longer and not break as it's swishing and tumbling in your washer and dryer. Never thought to use these bags for traveling. We use them to keep all of the little baby socks together and from getting lodged in between the rubber opening of our front load washer.
customer_reviews.author: GE-79

customer_reviews.title: Great for laundry
customer_reviews.text: Love these mesh bags. I use them for washing delicates (undergarments, delicate material clothing, etc.). I love the fact that the zipper gets tucked into a little tab and the mesh material is super soft so they don't cinch or damage other goods I put in the washer. The mesh bag I was using before constantly put holes in all my t-shirts because the mesh was too rough and the corner of the zipper would get caught in other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: MomofTheWildThings

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of the zipper
customer_reviews.text: They work great, just make sure the zipper is all the way closed under the little stopper band before throwing them in the wash. Otherwise your clothing will likely not stay in the bag. But they are very sturdy. I've been using the same bag in almost every load of laundry for the past month or so and it still looks like it did the day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to the mysterious disabppearing socks in the dryer! ;-)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered some of these laundry bags and I love them! Where have they been all my life. No more missing socks or underwear in the washing machine. No more broken straps on my delicate items. Once mine came and I used them, I quickly purchased another set for my sister as she has a newborn and even more tiny items to lose in the washer/dryer. They wash well, they are breathable, they are durable! I love them. I will be purhasing some more in the future. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Culver

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: I love that this set comes with multiple sizes and a reasonable price. I use mesh laundry bags all the time. Anything that has velcro on them goes in a bag so the velcro doesn't snag my other clothes. Anything I want to keep out of the dryer goes in one so I can easily grab it and won't forget after the wash cycle. And, I am a knitter who loves to give hand made gifts. I started giving everyone a mesh bag with my gifts. I'm not shy. I just tell people, wash this gift in the mesh bag on cold and lay out to dry. Honestly, it's a great way to protect things that are special.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Well made great value and improves laundry experience
customer_reviews.text: Great value sturdy, thoughtfully made and great value. 6 months has gone by and still look good as new. Very thoughtful design of elastic Slot that secures the zipper from accidentally opening during tumbling. I use these for bras, delicate items, things that have Velcro closures, and a separator of items that don’t go in the dryer. I always carry one when I travel and use as a dirty laundry bag. Another use is I hand wash all of my cashmere and merino wool sweaters by hand and use the bags to spin cycle the sweaters in the washer so they won’t stretch and tangle. No wringing! Comes out very close to dry.
customer_reviews.author: emikatnak

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable, reliable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item to mainly wash delicate clothing and big wool sweaters that I don’t want to ruin during the spin cycle. So far, so good. The big one has enough room for me to fit two of those bulky sweaters, and the smaller one takes all my delicate underwear and tights with no problem. I toss them in the dryer too, no problems so far either. No color transfer, no open zippers during washes, so it’s exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love these laundry bags!! The best thing for me is, when I put my lace bras in them, zip them shut and throw them in the washer, THERE ARE NO LINT PILLS STUCK TO THE LACE! The mesh is fine enough that the lint does not get through and your bras come out looking like they did when you bought em so go ahead and throw them in the washer with other clothes of like color. Not once has the underwire poked through either. Worth every dime you pay for them and I will be getting more!
customer_reviews.author: Montana Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Better than Net Bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags so far. I have only had them a week. I have 2 homes, and I am splitting the bags between them. I have always had a net type lingerie bag from Walmart. When looking for a bag for my snowbird home, I ran across these. Far superior than the net one! Love a choice in sizes, bra hooks do not tangle in this mesh... I always had to work the hooks free of the net. One net bag is over $4, and for a little more money, I get 5 higher quality bags. No brainer! I cannot speak to long term durability as yet.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve used 2 of the bags in the wash and dryer a few times and they’ve held up beautifully. Material seems durable and I like that you can tuck the zipper away on the corner of the bag so it doesn’t make noise in the dryer. Very happy with my purchase. Will be purchasing two more sets to give to my mom and sister. Update: A year later and they are all in perfect condition. I’m using them twice a week since I purchased them. Definitely worth the money. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: washateria helper
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I wash all my small, easy to lose, laundry items in the bags. I sort using the bags before I go to the laundry. It is so easy to keep the items that should wash together in the right load. It is easier too, when the load is done, I don't have to stretch into the washer to get those little things out because they are all in the bag. These are good sizes too, and have little elastic covers for the zippers to stay closed and not harm other items in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without them anymore!
customer_reviews.text: All my clothes got damaged in the wash and I read somewhere the laundry bags do the trick and they really do :') I like how these have zipper covers so they won't snag your clothes. It was a good deal and I thought I didn't need so many bags but I put everything in them so I might even get some more! I've used these at least 10, 15 times so far and no problems yet! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: So useful!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought these for "delicate" items but I am learning uses I didn't think about before, like these are great for throwing all the socks in...no more lost socks! Large ones are great for sweaters or other handwash items. They do seem to almost collect lint though but that's a minor inconvenience. Only had a few weeks but they've held up so far, will update if they fall apart!
customer_reviews.author: Keturah Erdley

customer_reviews.title: Great delicates laundry bags
customer_reviews.text: This set of multiple size mesh bags is perfect for washing delicates or small items. I keep one attached to a pant hanger to throw reusable cloth face masks in. This keeps them from getting lost among the rest do the laundry and easy to separate and hang to dry. They also are great for lingerie/bras so that the hooks don't catch on and snag other delicate items in the same wash load.
customer_reviews.author: EMUELLER

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I have used a few of these so far and have not had any problems with them falling apart. I was nervous to purchase some mesh laundry bags as so many had bad reviews. I do not use these that often but they have held up and I have used them to put some hand washed fabric in to pre-shrink which was fairly heavy wet. So far so good and these are working well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I didn't pay much attention to their sizes, I really just needed one for baby socks and wasn't worried tiny socks wouldn't fit, so I ordered. The sizes are great! Much larger than I expected. I was able to use one for baby socks. One for my 3 year olds socks and another for my 7 year olds socks. All in all, sock washing has become so much easier in my house and I never lose a stock! If I ever need more, I'll be back!
customer_reviews.author: Hobgoblin

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the huge bag yet, but the other sizes appear to be holding up well. I have a stackable washer and dryer and the bags have gone from the washer to the dryer and out with no issues. My clothes also seem to still get washed; I know there was some concern about the clothes actually getting clean within the bags. I appreciate all the different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: minseven

customer_reviews.title: Great for Washing Face Masks Too!
customer_reviews.text: My bras would often come out of the washer/dryer tangled on their own straps and I have had just enough of it! Bras are too expensive already without them getting frayed. These mesh bags have been great to keep things together. I also have been using the smaller ones to wash and dry my face masks so that they don't get lost in the load. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!  Zippers have survived many washings.
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted a lingerie laundry bag two years ago, but the zipper broke after the 3rd or 4th wash. I've been looking for a good replacement since, and been through a number of bags. This brand seems to hold up! 20 washes so far and zippers/seams are still intact! I gave one to a friend and she loves it. So far -- so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Black

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These lingerie bags are great. I had an old one that I used for years and the zipper finally broke so I bought this set. So far I have used them for about 3 weeks and they are great. I especially like the large ones for sweaters which I tend to forget about and then throw in the dryer. The smaller ones are perfect for sports bras. The zippers seem fairly sturdy so I'm not concerned that they won't last long. There's a little slot to fit the zipper pull in so it doesn't snag on anything. All in all I'm really happy with these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the durability of the bags as well as the strength of the zipper. I have had laundry bags before with very small plastic zippers but these are great. I have used the large bag to wash my sweaters so they do not snag on other clothes, worked great. The small bags are great for my bras so they don’t wrap around other items in the wash. Love these and look forward in using them in my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: These laundry bags impressed me as soon as I took them out of the bag. They impressed me even more after using them. The three sizes and two kinds of mesh give plenty of options for whatever needs washing. High quality seams, strong zippers, and the added flaps to cover the zipper pull all make for laundry bags that I know I will use for years. Out of all of the options on Amazon, I am pleased that I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Very good laundry bags
customer_reviews.text: After multiple washes, these bags have not snagged or torn, and the zippers continue to work well. Bagged clothing are protected during machine washing, which prolongs their wearability. The large black bag can hold multiple pairs of my slacks and yoga pants with sufficient room for agitation during machine washing. I was concerned that the mesh was quite small compared to a bag I already had, but judging from the cleanliness of the contained clothing, it's just fine.
customer_reviews.author: pickyreader

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These are so worth the money. I've only had them for a couple months, but I have 2 small children so I put these through the wash at least once a week. The zippers are sturdy and have a covering at the close to stop them from dinging the inside of the washer. Also, they are very close-knit so no bra hooks getting caught and tangled.
customer_reviews.author: English25

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry bags I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a few months now and love them! These have held up to multiple washes without any ripping or snagging. The zipper is strong and study and I love that it tucks into the end when closed so it doesn't accidentally open up mid wash cycle. Having multiple sizes is so great too, I didn't think I'd use the larger ones, but end up using them all the time now for my sweaters. These have really made my clothes last longer. Plus they are great to take traveling to stash your dirty clothes in!
customer_reviews.author: Krise

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without them
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these bags for the last 2 years and I could not live without them. Using a shared laundry machine really calls for them and they are the best quality. They dry quickly, they can carry a lot of clothes inside and the cost is totally worth it. Can't recommend enough. Truly, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Damiana Acuña

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Good find
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Love the quality of the material and the variety in sizing. I have a bag for anything I could need. Super pleased. Cute design, love the colors. I love that the zippers are covered during wash to prevent the bag from opening. We’ve only used them for a few washes but no complains. Great bang for your buck if you’re tired of cheap bags from the Dollar Store like me.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Barker

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is far more than the price. A pleasant surprise. The bags have been working out well. My only complaint is one of the bras opened up and came out of the bag and snagged one of the bra bags. Nonetheless, you cannot beat the amount of bags you receive and the price of this product. I would have given 5 stars if one of the bags did not get snagged.
customer_reviews.author: MB.5

customer_reviews.title: Great mesh laundry bags!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these laundry bags. I wanted large bags to wash robes and this set had everything I needed. The micro mesh is much better than previous bags I've owned and the zipper closures on the bags are made well. The set has a size for all my small or delicate items that I'd like to handle carefully(and keep out of my front load gasket on washer). I do recommend and have used at least five times since buying. Great bags and price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Feels stiff, unpleasant to the touch
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my initial review. When it arrived felt stiff and cheap...not at all what was expected or desired AND it was not returnable per Amazon. However I appealed to the vendor/manufacturer who said it was returnable. Once they saw that Amazon showed it as non returnable they very kindly refunded the purchase and said to keep or donate the item which latter option I chose.
customer_reviews.author: H Werner

customer_reviews.title: No More Missing Socks
customer_reviews.text: My socks kept getting lost in the washer and causing it to break down. I bought these bags to prevent the rogue socks from escaping. Now I also use them for my swimsuits and bras so the straps don’t get tangled up in the wash. These are easy to throw in the washer and dryer. My clothes come out clean. Never once have I had to re wash something after using the bags. They are also good to travel with and use for dirty clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Khall

customer_reviews.title: Good laundry helper
customer_reviews.text: The product is sturdy. It is wide. I have a compact washer whose spinner snags on delicates. Using these bags is helpful to preserve my clothes. It does fit in a compact machine in a load not over-packed. In the dryer, the items don't fully dry unless extra time is added. Delicates are better line dried anyway. Usually I dry on low heat in machine then line dry as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Plummy

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry bags
customer_reviews.text: Great, useful, well-made assortment of bags. These are just what I have been looking for .. I am sure now that I shall be ordering them for my daughters and daughters in law ( OK for the men in their lives to use them too.) The sizes are so appropriate. The largest one I used for a sweater that had " dry clean" instructions, and the sweater was unscathed. I shall have to say though, that as the child and grandchild of Scottish knitters, I was taught early on how to launder woolen sweaters...and have been very successful at it. The bags are a great help !
customer_reviews.author: Safety Czar

customer_reviews.title: For delicates
customer_reviews.text: Most of my clothes I buy are boutique or special fabrics and are handwash only, hang dry or delicate wash and cool dry. I don't have time for all of that. So these bags are perfect!! I use them in the washer and dry for all of my special clothes. They are big enough to hold pants, dresses and sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Lang

customer_reviews.title: Protect your delicates!
customer_reviews.text: Have used the largest and second largest one so far, depending on what you are putting into them...you might want to load them on bottom of the washer under other items. About halfway through the cycle I heard my washer making a strange noise, the zipper and corner of the bag was stuck under the lip of the wash basin and the upper frame. Just having to rotate it a little and pull it back out, gladly enough nothing was damaged on either item. The bag held up! It kept the washables inside protected and even through the dryer. I purchased two of these sets so I could give a lady friend of mine one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: ID I Am

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Good quality, sewn great. Zipper slides well! Better than the many ones I've picked up places. We've used them for socks, bras, and various other small laundry articles. Washes great! We've used them countless times and no tears or zipper problems. I like to use them also to corral our laundry pieces like wool dryer balls. The largest one we actually ended up using to corral Lego pieces. It's awesome because you can just scoop right up and zip it up. Doesn't take up as much space as a tote.
customer_reviews.author: Eyes That Shine

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I use the large one for dog toys and it worked great! The smallest is great for face masks. I feel this is a good value for the $.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, high quality mesh, very functional
customer_reviews.text: These are great. In fact, I'm going to order another set. The two things I really like about the design are: 1) the mesh is really good quality, and nothing else in the machine catches on it, and 2) the zipper has a little area that when fully zipped the zip pull tucks in to so it's impossible for the zipper pull to get caught on anything either. Love the multipack. These have been life savers for my more delicate clothes that would otherwise get snagged or ruined. Now, I don't have to wash them by hand, or do a separate wash just for them.
customer_reviews.author: VitaminSea

customer_reviews.title: Laundry sanity saver bags!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I got these bags! I wish I had thought to look for something like this years ago, because it was affordable and makes laundry so much easier. I use these bags for washing sweaters, bras, cloth face masks, and anything else delicate or with strings or straps. The bags are generously sized and holding up excellently.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these mesh bags for quite awhile! They have held up GREAT! The zipper is not rusting, and has a handy elastic loop that keeps it from snagging in the wash. I use them several times a week! Tip: I place items I want washed but NOT dried in the dryer in these bags. It makes it easy to sort the “lay flat to dry” clothes and keeps my delicate or hand wash items from getting abused! Also helps my husband keep an eye out for the clothes of mine that need special attention that he wouldn’t recognize in the dirty hamper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo great for keeping delicates separate and being able to wash them with the normal load since the bag helps protect them. Love that this came with a few sized bags. Also would probably be good for traveling with shoes to keep separate from clothes or even produce bags since it has the holes for breathability. Ive washed several times and no wearing signs yet! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: No more lost socks
customer_reviews.text: These mesh laundry bags are a must for washing socks. Each of my family members has their own bag for socks. The washer no longer eats them, and sorting them is a breeze. These bags are also great for delicate items, or to remind you to not dry an item. The bags are sturdy, the zipper stays closed, and the fine mesh weave keeps delicate items from getting torn. They work great for glitter or crocheted clothes.
customer_reviews.author: julie writes

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry bags!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and used a couple for laundry So I can’t speak to their durability. They came out looking like new this time. I’m really happy with them! They seem sturdy and even though I threw a decent amount of delicates in each one, everything came out nice and clean. I put them straight in the dryer after. I love the variation of sizes. I opted for the selection with the 2 cylindrical with the rectangular ones. I feel like I have one for everything.
customer_reviews.author: C3LiA

customer_reviews.title: Great to Have
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this for certain items with lace, delicacy, etc. being ruined in the washer or dryer. Have been using this item for four months and still as durable since day one. Have not had any issues with the bag seeming worn out. Items placed in bag are not ruined at all and look clean and smell washed as well. I do not have any issues with the zipper opening or anything like that either. Love how it comes in various sizes for various items and load sizes. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jinal

product_meta.title: BAGAIL Set of 6 Mesh Laundry Bags with Zip Lock-3 Large & 3 Medium for Laundry,Blouse, Hosiery, Stocking, Underwear, Bra and Lingerie, Travel Laundry Bag
feature_bullets: Automatic Lock so zipper won’t open when wash-ing and drying, zipper cover for extra protection, no rust. Zip up and pro-tect your clothes while washing and drying

Durable and breathable polyester fibre material, healthy and clean. These Lingerie Bags for Laundry perform perfectly every time protecting your delicates, and keeping them like new. Use in the Dryer too.
You & your clothes will LOVE the premium, silky mesh protecting your finest garments, it is the BEST to protect delicates, extend the life of lingerie, hosiery, intimates and more.
DELICATES LAUNDRY BAGS KEEP COLORS SEPARATE & SAFE:the three large white bags can be used for the light color clothes and the small bags can be used for the dark garments

(WORRY-FREE ONE YEAR WARRANTY)Travel Organizer Bag - See through mesh makes it easy for you to find your belongings and keep them from getting lost. This also makes security checks at the airport quick and convenient.
